name: CollegiumDay
0: ”Alexa ask collegium calendar what the day is”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.

des: This skill will find what the school day is (1-6) from the school sixdays calendar on collegiumcharter.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
